file.path: D:\TORRENT\________COMPLETED\Epub Collection#8(32Skulls)\Sara Fawkes - Queen's Knight [Invitation to Eden 09] (epub).epub
file.name: Sara Fawkes - Queen's Knight [Invitation to Eden 09] (epub).epub

tika.dc.description:
Evan McQueen had his entire life planned out. Poised to potentially take over a multi-billion dollar corporation, this trip to the island resort of Eden is Evan’s last chance to make a good impression on the billionaire CEO. He thought he knew where his life was going, was so certain of what he wanted…until a blonde vision stomping across the hotel lobby wearing motocross boots shattered all his preconceived notions. Dani Knight is a woman who isn’t afraid to defy convention, and unlike anyone Evan has ever met. The island’s tour guide and a world motorcycle traveller, she immediately fascinates Evan, and he can’t get enough of her.

Serving temporarily as the island’s tour guide and resident mechanic, Dani has seen countless guests come and go from Eden. She should be focusing on her upcoming ‘round-the-world journey and the day to day life of the island, not the man who sets her heart on fire. As much as she knows it’s temporary - they both have their own lives to lead - Dani can’t get Evan out of her head…or her heart. The more he reveals, the more she sees a kindred spirit in need of guidance, but she can’t make his decisions for him. She’s seen the island work miracles before, but can it bring together two souls going down vastly different paths?

Set within the lush Invitation To Eden and "Anything He Wants" universes.
